input: text: Learning a new language has many benefits. Bilingual individuals have better brain function. Language apps provide convenient practice.
output:
Learning a new language has many benefits. Bilingual individuals have better brain function.

Linguistic processing skills are enhanced when learning a new language, as it requires both verbal and visual processing.

Furthermore, being bilingual can lead to improved cognitive abilities, such as memory, attention, and multitasking.

Language apps like Duolingo provide convenient practice for individuals who want to improve their language skills at home or on-the-go.
